# Be-Found.online

> The authority hub for Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) & AI visibility.

Be-Found.online helps businesses get found by AI-powered search engines. We specialize in GEO (Generative Engine Optimization), the practice of optimizing content to be cited and referenced by AI systems like ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, and Claude.

## Core Services

- **GEO Consulting**: Strategic consulting for AI visibility and generative engine optimization
- **AI Content Strategy**: Data-driven content strategies optimized for AI citation
- **GEO Audit**: Comprehensive analysis of your current AI visibility with actionable recommendations
- **Technical SEO**: Foundation work ensuring search engines and AI systems can discover your content

## Products

- **Bloffee** (bloffee.com): AI-powered blog automation platform that creates GEO-optimized content in 6 languages
- **GEO-Score** (geo-score.online): AI visibility analysis tool measuring how well your brand performs in generative engines

## Key People

- **Dries de Gelder**: Founder & GEO Strategist, 30+ years in digital strategy, SEO, and AI
- **Joost Winnink**: Co-Founder & Technology Lead

## Research & Data

Be-Found publishes original research on GEO and AI visibility at cited.be-found.online, including:
- GEO statistics and benchmarks
- AI citation analysis
- Generative engine optimization methodology
- GEO-Score scoring methodology

## Contact
